Detailed Description

Class VariableFillPattern is an abstract base class that provides an interface to create objects that can calculate overlaps which correspond to a specific stencil.

If an object of a concrete VariableFillPattern type is provided when registering a refine operation with a RefineAlgorithm, then BoxOverlap calculations associated with that refine operation will use the VariableFillPattern implementation to restrict the overlaps to only a desired subset of the the intersection between the source and destination patches. Thus only data within that subset will be filled when RefineSchedule::fillData() is called. For example, an implementation of this class may be used to restrict the filling of data to locations on or near a patch boundary.

See also:
hier::BoxOverlap

xfer::RefineAlgorithm

xfer::RefineSchedule

Member Function Documentation

virtual boost::shared_ptr<hier::BoxOverlap> SAMRAI::xfer::VariableFillPattern::calculateOverlap ( const hier::BoxGeometry &  dst_geometry,
const hier::BoxGeometry &  src_geometry,
const hier::Box &  dst_patch_box,
const hier::Box &  src_mask,
const hier::Box &  fill_box,
const bool  overwrite_interior,
const hier::Transformation &  transformation 
) const [pure virtual]

This pure virtual method provides an interface to calculate overlaps between the destination and source geometries for a copy operation.

Implementations of this method will restrict the calculated BoxOverlap to a certain subset of the intersection between the destination and source geometries.

Parameters:
[in] dst_geometry geometry object for destination box
[in] src_geometry geometry object for source box
[in] dst_patch_box box for the destination patch
[in] src_mask the source mask, the box resulting from transforming the source box
[in] fill_box the box to be filled
[in] overwrite_interior controls whether or not to include the destination box interior in the overlap
[in] transformation the transformation from source to destination index space.
Returns:
boost::shared_ptr to the calculated overlap object

Implemented in SAMRAI::xfer::BoxGeometryVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::xfer::PatchInteriorVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerCellNoCornersVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerCellVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerNodeVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::pdat::SecondLayerNodeNoCornersVariableFillPattern, and SAMRAI::pdat::SecondLayerNodeVariableFillPattern.

virtual boost::shared_ptr<hier::BoxOverlap> SAMRAI::xfer::VariableFillPattern::computeFillBoxesOverlap ( const hier::BoxContainer &  fill_boxes,
const hier::Box &  patch_box,
const hier::Box &  data_box,
const hier::PatchDataFactory &  patch_data_factory 
) const [pure virtual]

This pure virtual method provides an interface for computing overlaps which define the space to be filled by a refinement operation.

Implementations of this method compute a BoxOverlap that covers a desired subset of the space defined by fill_boxes.

Parameters:
[in] fill_boxes list representing all of the space on a patch or its ghost region that may be filled by a refine operator (cell-centered represtentation)
[in] patch_box box representing the patch where a refine operator will fill data. (cell-centered representation)
[in] data_box box representing the full extent of the region covered by a patch data object, including all ghosts (cell-centered representation)
[in] patch_data_factory patch data factory for the data that is to be filled
Returns:
boost::shared_ptr to the calculated overlap object

Implemented in SAMRAI::xfer::BoxGeometryVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::xfer::PatchInteriorVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerCellNoCornersVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerCellVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerNodeVariableFillPattern, SAMRAI::pdat::SecondLayerNodeNoCornersVariableFillPattern, and SAMRAI::pdat::SecondLayerNodeVariableFillPattern.
